name: Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corporation
goal: SMBC would like to explain our concerns about the proposal on the intermediate parent undertaking (“IPU”) which will be a significant issue for Japanese banks.
interests: Banking and financial services, Economy, finance and the euro
euInitiatives: Comprehensive package of reforms to EU Banking Rules, comprising of proposed amendments to the Capital Requirements Regulation (“CRR”), the Capital Requirements Directive (“CRD”) and the Bank Recovery and Resolution Directive (“BRRD”), which was published by the European Commission (the “Commission”) on November 23, 2016.
